title: Sarah Hyland's fiance Wells Adams takes advantage of sweltering LA heat with shirtless jog
text:
Sarah Hyland's fiancee Wells Adams was spotted jogging shirtless in sweltering Los Angeles this Tuesday.

The 35-year-old Bachelorette hunk showed off his toned torso as he ran alongside Sarah's bloodhound Carl.

Popping in a pair of earbuds, Wells rounded off the look with shorts and casual sneakers as he worked up a sweat in Studio City.

Feel the heat: Sarah Hyland's fiancee Wells Adams was spotted jogging shirtless in sweltering Los Angeles this Tuesday

Over the weekend Wells was part of a triple date that united Sarah with her Modern Family castmates Sofia Vergara and Jesse Tyler Ferguson.

Jesse and Sofia brought their respective husbands Justin Mikita and Joe Manganiello, while Sarah was with her fiance - as seen in an Instagram post by Jesse.

Sarah and Wells have been together since October 2017 and celebrated their two-year anniversary on Instagram last week.

Man's best friend: The 35-year-old Bachelorette hunk showed off his toned torso as he ran alongside Sarah's bloodhound Carl

Modern Family reunion: Wells and Sarah enjoyed a 'triple date' last week with Jesse Tyler Ferguson, Justin Mikita, Sofia Vergara and Joe Manganiello

She posted a romantic black and white snap of herself craning her neck up to kiss him as he embraced her from behind.

'Two years ago I asked when you were going to ask me to be your girlfriend. This summer you asked me to be your wife. If two years feels like a lifetime then I can’t wait to spend my eternity with you,' she gushed in the caption.

'You’re the calm to my storm. The sun to my moon. The Chandler to my Monica. I can’t wait to marry you @wellsadams Happy two years baby #ToPlutoAndBack'.

'The Chandler to my Monica': Sarah and Wells have been together since October 2017 and celebrated their two-year anniversary on Instagram last week

Wells shared an Instagram photo of the pair of them leaning in for the kiss on a beach and wrote: 'I knew I was gonna marry her the 1st night I met her.'

He added: 'But I guess how anniversaries work, it’s when you decide to become boyfriend/girlfriend. Whatever, I lost that battle.'

Wells quipped: 'You’re my person and I can’t wait to drop this day as our anniversary and make a new one with all our friends watching, while they judge our wedding and eat and drink for free...buncha deadbeats. Happy anniversary @sarahhyland, I love you more. +1 anything you say.'
